item.title: Friends list update
item.content:encoded: The top friends list for hanging out has been removed from the main page. The current link at the top of this page no longer works. The new link is http://www.animecubed.com/billy/bvs/friends.html. If someone has admin rights and could change it that would be appreciated.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
One of my accounts was hanging out with stalkergirl today but when I used lazer beams during a bingo it still required chakra.

Their are two possibilities that I can think of.

1) the jutsu are only free if you have that ally in your team
2) the jutsu still have their regular costs during bingos

if anyone knows which is correct, please add it to the friendship section.
